snippet.title: Beloved Rapture - Steam NEXT Fest Trailer (Demo available!)
snippet.description:
After years of work... the first public demo has finally arrived! Hurray! 

🎮Download: http://store.steampowered.com/app/2017620/Beloved_Rapture/

This was released for Steam's #nextfest event, so it won't be around forever. Grab it while you can! And please let us know your feedback! 😄
